thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice little place
thread.title_full: Nice little place - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Matt H
title: Nice little place
text:
Hotel is very nice, staff is accommodating, parking lot is packed at night being a business hotel. Wifi works, kitchenette looked clean and usable but i was just there for the night so I didn't partake.
The only bunk part is that it's right inline with sfo flight path so it scared the junk out of me during a take off/landing.
